definition: born of the same parents/sibling/fellow citizen/compatriot

sentences.english: It is sad that many Chinese tend to be at loggerheads with their fellow Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 令人遺憾的是許多老中常與自己同胞相鬥。

sentences.english: Volta showed that this was not so.
sentences.chinese: 他的本國同胞伏打指出，情況並非如此。

sentences.english: every part of this earth is sacred to my people.every
sentences.chinese: 對我的同胞來說，地球上的每一寸土地都是神聖的。

sentences.english: However , many of female compatriot are dissatisfied with this sentence.
sentences.chinese: 不過，現在有很多女同胞對這句話很不滿意。

sentences.english: But still, you can't called on all of female compatriots give priority on fatties.
sentences.chinese: 但不能號召全體女同胞把對象優先放在胖子身上。

sentences.english: Adem, how much has it helped having fellow countrymen Nemanja Vidic and Zoran at the club?
sentences.chinese: 亞當，同胞維迪奇和託西奇對你有幫助嗎？

sentences.english: Many of his world-mates also served as Alliance starfighter pilots in the battle.
sentences.chinese: 他的許多同胞也在戰鬥中擔任同盟星際戰鬥機飛行員。

sentences.english: Let’s build on what our African partners started in Addis.
sentences.chinese: 讓我們建立起非洲同胞在阿迪斯開始的這個推力吧。

sentences.english: The resignation of Mr Tung Chee-hwa has been the focus of attention among compatriots in Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 董先生辭職是香港同胞十分關注的一件事情。

sentences.english: Facusse says Honduras can count for help on its expatriots living in the United States.
sentences.chinese: 法庫賽說，洪都拉斯可以依靠移居美國的同胞的幫助。

sentences.english: Perhaps one image still seduces Maradona's compatriots.
sentences.chinese: 也許有一個鏡頭至今還吸引着馬拉多納的同胞。

sentences.english: It is a region inhabited by an overwhelming majority of the Korean minority nationality in China.
sentences.chinese: 長白山區，是我國朝鮮族同胞的主要聚居地。

sentences.english: Man becomes great exactly in the degree in which he works for the welfare of his fellow-men.
sentences.chinese: 一個人是否偉大在於他爲同胞安寧幸福所做的努力。

sentences.english: From Kepi's standpoint they are all nabobs.
sentences.chinese: 根據凱皮的觀點，這些同胞全是大富豪。

sentences.english: Some selfish Chinese politicians are considered to be "typhoid Marys " to their own people.
sentences.chinese: 一些自私自利的中國政客，是自己同胞禍害的根源。

sentences.english: To how many thousands of our countrymen has it proved benefit?
sentences.chinese: 證實受益於它的我們同胞有多少千萬？

definition: to die in an accident/to die for a just cause
to suffer a calamity/to suffer (e.g. under torture)/distress
sufferer/a victim of a calamity/a person in distress
victim of an accident/casualty/martyr for one's country
to die in an accident or disaster/to be killed
lit. not an inch of steel (idiom); unarmed and defenseless
